thread.title: Mariah Carey Said She's "Literally Incapable" Of Surviving In Real World
thread.title_full: Mariah Carey Said She's "Literally Incapable" Of Surviving In The Real World

author: Ryan Schocket
title: Mariah Carey Said She's "Literally Incapable" Of Surviving In Real World
text:
View this image ›
Theo Wargo / Getty Images ID: 10575826 2. She addressed the situation briefly with this tweet after the show: Shit happens 😩 Have a happy and healthy new year everybody!🎉 Here's to making more headlines in 2017 😂
— Mariah Carey (@MariahCarey) ID: 10575865 3. But in her Tuesday interview with Rolling Stone , she elaborated on the non-festive moment, saying, “This was out of my control, and had everything not been such a total chaotic mess, then I would have been able to make something happen.” View this image ›
ABC ♫ “If you believe in yourself enough and know what you want / You’re gonna make it happen” ♫
ID: 10575929 4. MC also said, “Even the dancers should have stopped dancing and helped me off the fucking stage.” View this image ›
Columbia / Via youtube.com YES, we all would have loved to see Danceriah make an appearance.
ID: 10576413 5. She went on to say, “It was a mess, and I blame everybody.” View this image ›
Fox ID: 10576639 6. But Humbleriah also blamed herself, saying she should have just left after rehearsals. View this image ›
ABC / Eugene Gologursky / Getty ID: 10576772 7. MC left everyone with one more iconic Quote: , explaining how it’s hard for mortals to understand her struggle: “I wouldn’t understand somebody who had a desk job and how to do that. I literally am incapable of being in the real world and surviving.” View this image ›
NBC ID: 10576797 8. Literally same, Mimi. View this image ›
OWN ID: 10577073
